register.alreadyReg: User with this email is already registered
register.success: Registration Successful. Please activate the account by verifying the mail send to your email. Email is only valid for 24 hours
register.verify: Given emailId and Mobile-No doesn't match with registered emailId and mobileNo

activate.linkExp: Link has expired or Invalid token provided

resendActivation.timeNotExpired: It has not been 24 hours previous activation mail was sent. Kindly find the previous mail or wait to send new activation email
resendActivation.alreadyActivated: Your email is already activated. Please try signing in
resendActivation.success: Email sent. Please activate the account by verifying the mail send to your email. Email is only valid for 24 hours

forgotPassword.invalidEmail: Email not registered. If you have registered, make sure you have activated the account
forgotPassword.success: Code has been sent to your email. Please put it in the box to reset password. Code is valid for 1 hour

resetPassword.resetNotRequested: Reset was not requested. So for you no such link exists.
resetPassword.success: New password has been sent to your email id. Please login with that password.
